EmailTemplate.name: Pilot Webinars.DataLink Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Flight Technical Services Data Link Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Email Title Honeywell Aerospace Flight Technical Services Data Link Webinar You're invited to participate in this Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar, hosted by Brandon Burton - Honeywell Training Specialist. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- Data Link Services
- Data Link Architecture - Networks - Data Link Mandates - Necessary Equipment
Date: Wednesday, August 13, 2014 Time: 09:00 - 9:30 AM PST (GMT-7) Duration: 30 minutes
Click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell Pilot Training - Data Link Services Webinar.ics> to download an Outlook invite with the link and phone number for the webinar. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
